Trump: s tax attorneys from the law firm Morgan Lewis wrote a letter stating that Trump's tax returns from the past decade contain no undisclosed income from Russian sources.
Sen: Chris Murphy tweeted that the law firm used by Trump to show he has no ties to Russia was named Russia Law Firm of the Year for their extensive ties to Russia.
Chambers: Partners, a reputable source of law firm rankings, bestowed the "Russia Law Firm of the Year" award to Morgan Lewis in 2016, citing the firm's work in Russia's energy, finance, and technology sectors.
Morgan Lewis: s website acknowledges the accolade and boasts about its Moscow office, highlighting the firm's deep familiarity with the local legislation, practices, and key players in Russia.
